EXTENSION_NAME.description: Extension name for the Chrome webstore.

EXTENSION_SHORTNAME.description: Extension short name for the Chrome webstore (< 12 chars).

EXTENSION_DESCRIPTION.message: Changes the word 'meeting' into the word 'review' when you type it, so that people always come prepared to future gatherings.
EXTENSION_DESCRIPTION.description: Extension description for the chrome webstore.

KEYWORD_OMNIBAR_TRIGGER.description: Omnibar (url address bar) trigger for extension.

BROWSER_ACTION_TITLE.message: Click to view options for No Meeting

TEXT_TIPS_LIST.description: Body text of tips list popup.

TITLE_IMPORT_PANEL.description: Title of import / export settings panel.

TEXT_IMPORT_PANEL.message: This is a JSON representation of your shortcuts. You can import a different set by replacing the JSON (does not affect local backup, must explicitly save after importing), and you can also convert a CSV or TSV table of shortcuts to JSON. I encourage you to copy'n'paste the JSON to save a copy to your own hard drive. Just in case!
TEXT_IMPORT_PANEL.description: Body text of import / export settings panel.

TITLE_TIMEOUT_PANEL.description: Title of shortcut timeout settings panel.

TEXT_TIMEOUT_PANEL.message:
The shortcut timeout is the time the system waits, since the last character you typed, before it decides to reset. Once the system resets, it will no longer include the previously typed characters as part of the shortcut.

For example: imagine if you had a shortcut 
no-op
, if you then type 
No
and wait longer than the shortcut timeout before typing 
-op
, it will allow you to type it without triggering the expansion. The default is ms.
TEXT_TIMEOUT_PANEL.description: Body text of shortcut timeout settings panel.

TITLE_BLACKLIST_PANEL.description: Title of domain blacklist settings panel.

TEXT_BLACKLIST_PANEL.message: This is a list of sites where the extension has been disabled and will not trigger. This state is indicated as a badge on the extension icon next to the URL bar (ON or OFF).
TEXT_BLACKLIST_PANEL.description: Body text of domain blacklist settings panel.

MESSAGE_REMOVE_ROW_POPUP.message: Are you sure you want to remove this shortcut? You may not be able to undo this action!
MESSAGE_REMOVE_ROW_POPUP.description: Confirmation prompt to user when removing a row.

MESSAGE_IMPORT_SUCCESS.message: Import successful! Shortcuts are NOT saved yet, please save them.
MESSAGE_IMPORT_SUCCESS.description: Success message to user when import worked.

MESSAGE_BACKUP_WARNING.message: This will overwrite the old backup (if any) with your current shortcuts. You will lose the backup if you sign out of the browser, reset Chrome sync, or uninstall the extension! Please use the import/export function to save a copy of your shortcuts.
MESSAGE_BACKUP_WARNING.description: Warning message when user is about to attempt backing up his or her shortcuts.

MESSAGE_RESTORE_WARNING.message: This will overwrite your current shortcuts with your last backup!
MESSAGE_RESTORE_WARNING.description: Warning message when user is about to attempt restoring his or her shortcuts from their last backup.

MESSAGE_EMERGENCY_RESTORE_WARNING.message: We've detected that your shortcut data may have been corrupted in the version upgrade due to Chrome sync issues. We have stored an emergency backup of your sync data just in case. Would you like to restore to this backup?
MESSAGE_EMERGENCY_RESTORE_WARNING.description: Warning message to show user when we detect that they may want to restore to an emergency backup.

ERROR_BACKUP_FAILED.message: Could not backup shortcuts! May be over size limit.
ERROR_BACKUP_FAILED.description: Error message to be displayed to user when backup fails.

ERROR_RESTORE_FAILED.message: Could not restore backup! Data may be corrupted or storage limits may have changed.
ERROR_RESTORE_FAILED.description: Error message to be displayed to user when restore from backup fails.

ERROR_OVER_SPACE_QUOTA.description: Error message to be displayed when user goes over the quota for total storage space that Chrome's sync API allows.

ERROR_OVER_ITEM_SPACE_QUOTA.description: Error message to be displayed when user goes over the quota for space per item that Chrome's sync API allows.

ERROR_OVER_ITEM_QUOTA.description: Error message to be displayed when user goes over the max number of items that Chrome's sync API allows.

ERROR_DUPLICATE_ITEMS.description: Error message to be displayed when duplicate shortcuts are found

ERROR_IMPORT_INVALID_JSON.message: Import failed! Shortcuts were in an invalid JSON format.
ERROR_IMPORT_INVALID_JSON.description: Error message to be displayed when importing invalid json

ERROR_IMPORT_NOT_OBJECT.message: Import failed! Shortcuts have to be defined in a top level JS object.
ERROR_IMPORT_NOT_OBJECT.description: Error message to be displayed when importing with an array at the top level

ERROR_IMPORT_ADDING_ROWS.message: Import failed! Errors found while adding shortcuts.
ERROR_IMPORT_ADDING_ROWS.description: Error message to be displayed when errors adding rows from import

WARNING_SHORTCUT_VERSION_MISMATCH.message: Warning! Your shortcuts database version doesn't match your extension version. This may be because they haven't been fully synced yet. Please try reloading the extension or restarting the browser to avoid corrupting your data!
WARNING_SHORTCUT_VERSION_MISMATCH.description: Warning message to user that their shortcuts are not yet synced with their app version

WARNING_SHORTCUT_DISABLED.message: Your AutoTextExpander shortcuts have been disabled to prevent unexpected behavior.
WARNING_SHORTCUT_DISABLED.description: Warning message to user that their shortcuts are disabled when in unreliable states.

PROMPT_CONTINUE.description: The prompt we append to the popup text for any confirmation dialogs

TITLE_SAVE_BUTTON.description: Title for the save button for the options page

TITLE_BACKUP_BUTTON.description: Title for the backup button for the options page

TITLE_RESTORE_BUTTON.description: Title for the restore button for the options page

TITLE_IMPORT_BUTTON.description: Title for the import/export button for the options page

TITLE_TIMEOUT_BUTTON.description: Title for the shortcut timeout button for the options page

TITLE_BLACKLIST_BUTTON.description: Title for the domain blacklist button for the options page

TITLE_TIMEOUT_LABEL.description: Title for the shortcut timeout label on the options page

HEADER_SHORTCUT_SECTION.description: Header for the shortcuts section of the options page

TITLE_FEEDBACK_LINK.description: Title for the feedback link on the options page

TITLE_FEATURE_REQUEST_LINK.description: Title for the feature request link on the options page

TITLE_BACKUP_TIMESTAMP_LABEL.description: Title for the last local backup timestamp message label

TITLE_SHORTCUT_QUOTA_LABEL.description: Title for the # of shortcuts of sync storage used message label

TITLE_STORAGE_QUOTA_LABEL.description: Title for the # of bytes of sync storage used message label

TITLE_BACK_TO_TOP_LINK.description: Title for the link to jump back to the top of the page

TEXT_DEMO_SECTION.message: Try your shortcuts here! Make sure to save them first.
TEXT_DEMO_SECTION.description: Text to insert into the demo section of the options page

TITLE_TIPS_LINK.description: Title for the link to useful tips and information on the options page

TEXT_OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION.message: Edit your database of shortcuts and expansions here!
TEXT_OPTIONS_DESCRIPTION.description: Text for options page description text.
